messages.subject: welcome to new listmembers
messages.msgSnippet: We had quite a few new people join the list in the last week or so and I just wanted to say hello and welcome and remind you all to please take the time to
messages.messageBody:
We had quite a few new people join the list in the last week or so and
I just wanted to say hello and welcome and remind you all to please
take the time to read the list guidelines. You should have received
them by email when you joined, but, if not, you can read them in the
files area of this list or email the listowners and moderators at
<unschoolingdiscussion-owner@yahoogroups.com> and we'll send you a
copy.

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.
